title: Sweetcorn salsa
description: A zingy sweetcorn salsa recipe – perfect for dipping into with crisps or tortilla chips.
ingredients: 340g tin of sweetcorn, drained and rinsed
½ small red onion, finely chopped
Bunch of fresh coriander, roughly chopped
Handful of salted peanuts, finely chopped

method.Step 1: Tip the sweetcorn into a bowl or large mortar. Roughly crush with a potato masher or pestle. Add the onion and coriander, chilli, salted peanuts and lime then taste, season and serve.
